text: and my wrath shall be kindled against them in that day, and I will forsake them, and will hide my face from them, and they shall be devoured. All evils and afflictions shall find them, so that they shall say in that day, in truth it is because God is not with me, that these evils have found."

segments.text: and my wrath shall be kindled against them in that day, and I will forsake them, and
will hide my face from them, and they shall be devoured.
All evils and afflictions shall find them, so that they shall say in that day, in truth
it is because God is not with me, that these evils have found."
